title: Zerofox
description:
The OpenCTI ZeroFox connector can be used to import knowledge from the ZeroFoxplatform. The connector leverages the Threat Intelligence data feeds to get data about ...
Note: Requires subscription to the ZeroFox CTI feeds. The subscriptiondetails dictate what feeds are available to the connector.In order to get a suscription, please contact
